See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <wsdl:definitions name="FindOffersInteraction" targetNamespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffers:1:rivtabp21" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tjsr="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersResponder:1" xmlns:tjsi="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersInitiator:1" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffers:1:rivtabp21" xmlns:itr="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Tjänsteinteraktionens namn: FindOffersInteraction Beskrivning: Service for finding caregivers Revisioner: Tjänstedomän: service:catalogue Tjänsteinteraktionstyp: Fråga-Svar WS-profil: RIVTABP21 Förvaltas av: Stockholms Läns Landsting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffers:1:rivtabp21"> <xs:import schemaLocation="FindOffersResponder_1.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersResponder:1"/> <xs:import schemaLocation="../../core_components/itintegration_registry_1.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="FindOffersRequest"> <wsdl:part name="LogicalAddress" element="itr:LogicalAddress"> <wsdl:documentation>The organisation number of the organization owning the targeted caregiver catalogue.</wsdl:documentation> </wsdl:part> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:FindOffers"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FindOffersResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:FindOffersResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="FindOffersResponderInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="FindOffers"> <wsdl:input message="tns:FindOffersRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:FindOffersResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="FindOffersResponderBinding" type="tns:FindOffersResponderInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="FindOffers"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersResponder:1:FindOffers" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header use="literal" message="tns:FindOffersRequest" part="LogicalAddress"/> <soap:body use="literal" parts="parameters"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="FindOffersResponderService"> <wsdl:port name="FindOffersResponderPort" binding="tns:FindOffersResponderBinding"> <soap:address location="http://tempuri.org"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. Sveriges Kommuner och Landsting licenses this file to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersResponder:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:service:catalogue:FindOffersResponder:1" xmlns:core="urn:riv:service:catalogue:1"> <xs:import schemaLocation="../../core_components/service_catalogue_1.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:1"/> <xs:element name="FindOffers" type="tns:FindOffersType"/> <xs:element name="FindOffersResponse" type="tns:FindOffersResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="FindOffersType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>En eller flera sökparametrar kan anges för att hitta utbudspunkter.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hsaId" type="core:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element name="relativeDistinguishedName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Wildcard-sökning baserat på RDN i HSA. Exempel: Ögonklinik Stockholm Göteborg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="productCode" type="core:CVType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sökning baserad på kod/kodverk, exempelvis HSA verksamhetskoder.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="productName" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sökning baserad på produktnamn.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="supportedInteractions" type="core:SupportedInteractionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sökning baserad på RIVTA interaktioner, Exempel: clinicalprocess:requestworkflow:ProcessRequest</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FindOffersResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="offers" type="core:OfferType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. Sveriges Kommuner och Landsting licenses this file to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:service:catalogue:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:service:catalogue:1"> <!----> <xs:complexType name="OffersTransactionType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>When deleteFlag is set to true, the given careUnitId will be deleted from the catalogue. When set to false a create or update will be performed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="deleteFlag" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="offer" type="tns:OfferType" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="OfferType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="hsaObject" type="tns:HsaObjectType"/> <xs:element name="validContractDatePeriod" type="tns:DatePeriodType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid date from when this care unit starts handling type of cares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="supportedInteractions" type="tns:SupportedInteractionsType"/> <xs:element name="products" type="tns:ProductType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="comment" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="HsaObjectType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>careUnitId == HSAid, careUnitName, careUnitAddress</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="hsaId" type="tns:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element name="relativeDistinguishedName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="postlAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postalCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="CapacityType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="displayName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="codeSystem" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="validTo" type="tns:TS"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="SupportedInteractionsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Each service domain that can be used for the given care unit id. For example set interaction to urn:clinicalprocess:requestflow:ProcessRequest and urn:clinicalprocess:requestflow:ProcessRequestOutcome if the care unit can recieve requests and send request answers.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="interaction" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="ProductType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="typeOfProduct" type="tns:CVType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DatePeriodType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Används för att specificera ett datumintervall med hjälp av start- och slutdatum.
start: Startdatum på formatet ÅÅÅÅMMDD end: Slutdatum på formatet ÅÅÅÅMMDD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="start" type="tns:DateType"/> <xs:element name="end" type="tns:DateType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProductCapacityType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="capacity" type="tns:CapacitType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CapacitType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CodeSystem information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="validTo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="code" type="tns:CVType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CareUnitCapacityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="hsaId" type="tns:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element name="relativeDistinguishedName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="product" type="tns:ProductCapacityType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TimePeriodType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Används för att specificera ett datumintervall med hjälp av start- och slutdatum.
start: Startdatum på formatet YYYYMMDDhhmmss end: Slutdatum på formatet YYYYMMDDhhmmss</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="start" type="tns:TimeStampType"/> <xs:element name="end" type="tns:TimeStampType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CVType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>code: Kod codeSystem: Kodverkets oid codeSystemName: Namn på kodverk codeSystemVersion: Version av kodverk. displayName: Namn på kod för visning originalText:</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="codeSystem" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="codeSystemName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="codeSystemVersion" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="displayName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="originalText" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Simple data types--> <!----> <xs:simpleType name="CareUnitNameType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Care unit name, corresponds to RDN in HSA</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1024"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TimeStampType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A quantity specifying a point on the axis of natural time. A point in time is most often represented as a calendar expression.
The time has the format YYYYMMDDhhmmss</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])(0[0-9]|1[0-9]|2[0123])([0-5])([0-9])([0-5])([0-9])"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Date format SSYYMMDD--> <xs:simpleType name="DateType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date format SSYYMMDD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!----> <xs:simpleType name="HsaIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TS"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3}(0[1-9]{1}|1[0-2]{1})([0-2]{1}[0-9]{1}|3[0-1]{1})([0-1]{1}[0-9]{1}|2[0-3]{1})[0-5]{1}[0-9]{1}[0-5]{1}[0-9]{1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DT"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3}(0[1-9]{1}|1[0-2]{1})([0-2]{1}[0-9]{1}|3[0-1]{1})"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ResultCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xs:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskrivning: Grundl��ggande informationsobjekt f��r dom��nen itintegration:registry (adressering av tj��nster)
Revisionshistorik: 2011-06-27 Mats Ekhammar, Callista Enterprise AB Added ServiceContractType
Datum: 2011-05-04 Beskrivning: Initial version F��rfattare: marcus.krantz@callistaenterprise.se</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="LogicalAddress" type="LogicalAddressType"/> <xs:element name="ServiceContract" type="ServiceContractType"/> <xs:simpleType name="LogicalAddressType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines the type for logical address according to national reference architecture. Superseeds wsa:To as type for logical address header in RIVTA 2.1.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceContractType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type which describes a service contract. Used in interaction GetSupportedServiceContracts.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ServiceContractNamespace" type="xs:anyURI"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
